<Text: Sigma I-67 and II-67 war games:  The games were supervised by a Control appointed to oversee both sides.>

Text: Sigma I-67 and II-67 war games:  The opposing Blue and Red Teams customary in war games were designated the friendly and enemy forces as was usual; however, several smaller teams were sometimes subsumed under Red and Blue Teams.
Triplets:<Sigma I-67
5:
--------------------
Text: Sigma I-67 and II-67 war games:  Over the course of the games, the Red Team at times contained the Yellow Team for the Peoples Republic of China, the Brown Team for the Democratic Republic of Vietnam, the Black Team for the Viet Cong, and Green for the USSR.
